entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 before morning. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 8. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow mixed with rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to periods of snow or rain late in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 in the evening then northwest 30 near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 30 April 2023
